data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Masaaki Toma awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Nagoya.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
In the minute 5, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 9, Nagoya's Sho Inagaki gets in a shot on goal at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Cerezo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Nagoya.
Throw-in for Cerezo close to the penalty box.
Masaaki Toma signals a Cerezo throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Throw-in Nagoya.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya are pushing forward but Yuki Soma's finish is wide of the goal.
Masaaki Toma awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Yutaka Yoshida is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shumpei Naruse (Nagoya) has replaced the possibly injured Yutaka Yoshida at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 31, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nagoya push forward at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium and Mu Kanazaki gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Cerezo defence.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 41, In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Cerezo at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Masaaki Toma will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 45, Masaaki Toma signals a throw-in for Cerezo, close to Nagoya's area.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Mu Kanazaki for Nagoya drives towards goal at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Masaaki Toma awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Free kick Nagoya.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Cerezo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Bruno Pereira Mendes (Cerezo) strikes at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium but his header is cleared.
Masaaki Toma signals a Nagoya throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
The home team have replaced Naoki Maeda with Hiroyuki Abe. This is the second substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a third substitution, with Gabriel Xavier replacing Yuki Soma.
In the minute 60, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 66, Cerezo needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Cerezo make their first substitution with Hiroaki Okuno replacing Yoichiro Kakitani.
In the minute 69, In Nagoya Nagoya's Oh Jae-suk is caught offside.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nagoya's Hiroyuki Abe has been booked in Nagoya.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Hiroyuki Abe for Nagoya gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 75, Masaaki Toma awards Cerezo a goal kick.
The away team replace Riku Matsuda with Yusuke Maruhashi.
Toshiyuki Takagi is replacing Tatsuhiro Sakamoto for Cerezo at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Nagoya, Eiichi Katayama (Cerezo) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 78, Nagoya have a goal kick.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nagoya's Takuji Yonemoto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Cerezo at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
In the minute 85, Nagoya's Sho Inagaki misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
Koji Suzuki is on a sub for Hiroshi Kiyotake for Cerezo.
In the minute 87, Masaaki Toma signals a Nagoya throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In Nagoya Nagoya attack through Gabriel Xavier. The finish is off target, however.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Nagoya.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Nagoya.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Cerezo's Koji Suzuki breaks free at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Masaaki Toma blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
Goal! Mateus gives Nagoya a 1-0 lead in Nagoya.
Great play from Gabriel Xavier to set up the goal.
